duties_responsibilities.duty: Enroll existing clients in Horace Mann benefits during the open enrollment period for each client.
Educate employees on employee benefit offerings and conduct enrollments.
Present employee benefit offerings in a clear and informative manner.
Be assigned to multiple accounts for enrollment services.
Deliver superior customer service and ensure excellent communication skills.
Maintain a strong work ethic and handle multi-tasking effectively.
Hold an active Health insurance license.
